name: Infinite World Slayer!
description:
Infinite World Slayer is still on development and need your help!
Your feedback and ideas are very important for the development!


Become a World Slayer and travel into worlds while destroying and defeating everything on your path!
You mission? Rank up on the World Slayer Rank and become a Natural Disaster!

Don't forget to leave a comment with feedback or ideas that could be implemented on the game! Thank you!
